alert.note: Alert for Brown; Calumet; Door; Kewaunee; Manitowoc; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued May 30 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ADVISORY ISSUED FOR SHORELINE WISCONSIN... The Wisconsin Department of Natural Resources has issued an Air Quality Advisory for Ozone which will remain in effect until 11:00 PM CDT tonight. This advisory affects people living in the following counties: Brown, Calumet, Door, Kewaunee, Manitowoc, southern Marinette, and southern Oconto. Due to southerly transport of ozone precursors and increasing temperatures, the air quality index is expected to reach the UNHEALTHY FOR SENSITIVE GROUPS level. People with lung disease (such as asthma), children, older adults, and people who are active outdoors (including outdoor workers) should reduce prolonged or heavy outdoor exertion. For more information on current air quality, please see: https://airquality.wi.gov

area.areaDesc: Brown; Calumet; Door; Kewaunee; Manitowoc; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
